member.name: T:Duccsoft.ImGui.BoundsList
member.summary: Represents every widget that is ready to be drawn in a frame.

member.name: P:Duccsoft.ImGui.Elements.Element.CurrentItem
member.summary: Returns the element currently being built as a child of this element, or null if no child is currently being built.

member.name: P:Duccsoft.ImGui.Elements.Element.LastItem
member.summary: Returns the last child that has already been built, or null if no child has been built.

member.name: M:Duccsoft.ImGui.Elements.Element.OnBegin
member.summary:
Add this element to its Parent, updates its input data, and calls ImGui.NewLine.
For any subclass of Element, OnBegin should be called within its constructor, or immediately after the element is constructed.

member.name: M:Duccsoft.ImGui.Elements.Element.OnEnd
member.summary: For any subclass of Element that contains no children, OnEnd should be called immediately after OnBegin.

member.name: F:Duccsoft.ImGui.ImGuiCol.PopupBg
member.summary: Background of popups, menus, tooltips windows

member.name: F:Duccsoft.ImGui.ImGuiCol.FrameBg
member.summary: Background of checkbox, radio button, plot, slider, text input

member.name: F:Duccsoft.ImGui.ImGuiWindowFlags.NoTitleBar
member.summary: The window will have no title bar, which is useful for popups.

member.name: F:Duccsoft.ImGui.ImGuiWindowFlags.NoFocusOnAppearing
member.summary: Prevent the window from taking focus when transitioning from hidden to visible state.

member.name: M:Duccsoft.ImGui.ImGui.SetNextWindowFocus
member.summary: Causes the next window that is created to start focused. Should be called before Begin().

member.name: P:Duccsoft.ImGui.ImGuiSystem.MouseButton
member.summary: Filters in the current mouse state in to the "highest priority" button clicked, returning null if no button is clicked.
